statements: SELECT * FROM encryption_keys WHERE id = 1;
SELECT key_name, key_value FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_name = 'MasterKey';
SELECT id, key_name, created_at FROM encryption_keys ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT id, key_name, updated_at FROM encryption_keys WHERE updated_at IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_name LIKE '%secret%';
SELECT id, key_name, created_at FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_name = 'master_key' ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5
SELECT key_name, key_value FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_value LIKE '%abc%' ORDER BY key_name ASC
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5) AND key_name <> 'backup_key'
SELECT key_name, key_value, created_at, updated_at FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_value IS NOT NULL ORDER BY updated_at DESC
SELECT id, key_name, key_value, created_at FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_name LIKE '%key%' AND key_value IS NOT NULL ORDER BY created_at ASC
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT key_owner, encryption_key FROM encryption_keys WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data WHERE data_id = 3;
SELECT encrypted_data, encryption_key_id FROM sensitive_data WHERE encryption_key_id = 2;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_owner = 'Alice';
SELECT encryption_key, key_owner FROM encryption_keys WHERE id = 1;
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data WHERE data_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM sensitive_data WHERE encryption_key_id = 2 ORDER BY data_id DESC;
SELECT encryption_key, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM encryption_keys GROUP BY encryption_key HAVING total_count > 1;
SELECT key_owner, encrypted_data FROM encryption_keys INNER JOIN sensitive_data ON encryption_keys.id = sensitive_data.encryption_key_id WHERE key_owner = 'Alice';
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys;
SELECT key_id, key_value FROM encryption_keys ORDER BY created_at DESC;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_id = 'ab34cd56-7890-1234-5678-9012ef34ab56';
SELECT key_value FROM encryption_keys WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT key_id, key_value FROM encryption_keys ORDER BY key_id ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys ORDER BY created_at DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT key_id, key_value FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_id = 'abc123';
SELECT key_id, key_value, created_at FROM encryption_keys WHERE created_at BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-03-31 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM encryption_keys WHERE key_value LIKE '%secret%';
SELECT key_id, key_value, created_at FROM encryption_keys ORDER BY key_id ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, key_name, created_at FROM encryption_keys;

SELECT data_value, data_key_id FROM sensitive_data ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT username, created_at FROM data_users WHERE id = 3;

SELECT source_name, source_type FROM data_sources ORDER BY source_name DESC;
